content.rendered: [vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1527767850756{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1528353169576{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_custom_heading text=”‘Ensuring Quality and Safety’” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689855212607{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”We understand the critical role inspections play in ensuring quality, safety, and compliance. Whether you require non-destructive testing, OCTG inspection, our dedicated team of inspectors and technicians is committed to delivering accurate, reliable, and efficient solutions tailored to your specific needs. Partner with us for thorough and precise inspections that provide you with the confidence and assurance you deserve.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1691008786896{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1527830922650{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #edeff5 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8462″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691265645982{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Non-Destructive Testing (NDT)” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689855294118{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Non-Destructive Testing (NDT) services offer a non-intrusive approach to inspecting materials, components, and structures. Utilizing advanced techniques such as ultrasonic testing, radiography, magnetic particle inspection, and visual inspection, our certified NDT inspectors detect flaws, defects, and irregularities without causing any damage. This ensures the integrity and reliability of your assets while minimizing downtime and costly repairs.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689855312289{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1527830922650{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #edeff5 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”OCTG Inspection” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689855333511{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Oil Country Tubular Goods (OCTG) play a critical role in the oil and gas industry, and our OCTG inspection services are designed to ensure their quality and compliance. Our inspectors meticulously assess the condition, dimensions, and performance characteristics of OCTG products, including casing, tubing, and drill pipes. With our expertise and adherence to industry standards, we help you make informed decisions and maintain the highest levels of safety and efficiency.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689855350641{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8457″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691261702549{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1527830922650{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #edeff5 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”8438″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1691188624647{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Distributed Goods Inspection” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689855369796{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”In the era of global supply chains, ensuring the quality and conformity of distributed goods is paramount. Our distributed goods inspection services provide comprehensive assessments of products, components, and materials at various stages of the supply chain. Our inspectors verify compliance with specifications, conduct quality control checks, and perform visual inspections to ensure that goods meet your requirements and adhere to regulatory standards.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689855405717{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1691008836092{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #edeff5 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830934075{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Calibration Services” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689855445106{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”font-weight-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Precision and accuracy are essential in many industries, and our calibration services guarantee the reliability of your measurement instruments and equipment. Our skilled technicians calibrate a wide range of instruments, including pressure gauges, temperature sensors, flow meters, and electrical devices, using traceable standards and state-of-the-art calibration equipment. With our calibration services, you can trust in the accuracy of your measurements and maintain the highest levels of quality control.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1689855471395{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1527830950800{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”6696″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1527829479029{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
